questions.label: IDEATION
prompts: Which of the 6 scenarios would you like to work on for your project?

What type of design can you envision for your topic?

questions.label: TEAM QUESTION
prompts: What do you believe is the most important factor for a successful team? Why?
How is your course load this quarter?
Ideally, how often would you like to meet with your team members?
Based on previous team projects, what do you think worked and didn't work for you?
What do you look for in a good team member?
